about_the_game:
Brave the Dungeon is a thrilling and immersive multiplayer open-world game that takes you on an epic journey to fight against the daemonic invasion threatening the archipelago. As a player, you'll get to choose from a variety of archetypes such as thief, ranger, or technomancer, each with their own unique set of skills and abilities.

You'll find yourself exploring a vast open world, filled with treacherous dungeons, dangerous forests, and other mysterious locations. Along the way, you'll encounter other players from all over the world, forming alliances and working together to overcome challenges and defeat the daemonic forces that threaten the archipelago.

As you progress through the game, you'll level up your character, unlocking new skills and abilities, and customizing your equipment to suit your playstyle. With a variety of quests, puzzles, and challenges, Brave the Dungeon offers endless gameplay opportunities that will keep you coming back for more.

With stunning graphics, realistic sound effects, and an engaging storyline, Brave the Dungeon delivers an immersive gaming experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Whether you're a fan of action games, RPGs, or just looking for an exciting adventure, this game has something for everyone.

So, are you ready to team up and embark on a journey to fight against the daemonic invasion in Brave the Dungeon?

• Immersive Questlines and Engaging Characters

Uncover the secrets of Deandrae by playing through an immersive main quest, starting from the moment you leave your hometown. Befriend or betray new adventurers who have come to explore, and experience your adventure through the eyes of its residents.

• Multiplayer Roleplaying

Create your character and forge your own path and reputation, be a thief or a guardian, have magic or science abilities. Whether you journey alone or with friends, a unique adventure awaits in a new world with hundreds of locations.

• Archipelago splendorland

The story lives and breathes through the world of Brave the Dungeon, which brings to life 4 distinct Deandrae regions. From the Elven forests to the daemonic island, each area offers its own risks and rewards.

• Key Features

  • Character Customization - Change the appearance of your character to make them unique.
  • 25 Playable Classes - Thief or Ranger, Guardian or Alchemist, Necromancer or Technomancer, choose the way you want to play
  • Collect hundreds of items - Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, Legendary classes of loot with over 10000 unique weapon, armors and any other items with tons of rare variations with unique stats.
  • Multiplayer Open World - Up to 24 players, make friends or enemies and explore Deandrae
  • Fast-paced Combat - Attack, dodge, jump, block in real-time to defeat your enemies or avoid getting hit.
  • Procedural Dungeons - Explore procedurally generated dungeons full of enemies, loot, and a boss at the end.

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
